New Records: CJ McCollum scored 38 points, and hit six 3s, making 13 of 24 shots overall from the floor.
Key Match Events: Jordan Hawkins buried a 3 in the third for a 70-67 lead
Dejounte Murray sank one for a 76-67 and New Orleans held off every Sixers run from there
McCollum buried a 3 in the fourth to push the lead back to 10 points
Pre-Game Insights: Zion Williamson was suspended for one game for a violation of team policies, including repeated lateness to practices or flights
Herb Jones is sidelined indefinitely with a posterior labrum tear in his right shoulder
Joel Embiid missed his third straight game because of a sprained left foot
Post-Match Reflections: The Pelicans snapped a two-game losing streak and won for only the third time since Dec. 7
The 76ers are 8-15 when Joel Embiid doesnâ€™t play
The 76ers are 15-21 and hoping at this point just to make the play-in tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans played without forward and top defensive player Herb Jones
The 76ers played without All-Star center Joel Embiid
The 76ers were pushed to the final minute before holding off the lowly Wizards at home on Wednesday
Others: Paul George had 25 points and 11 rebounds for the Sixers
Tyrese Maxey had 30 points and 12 assists
The Pelicans play at Boston on Sunday, and the 76ers visit Orlando
